website_summaries.verdict: Made with only a handful of high-quality ingredients like venison, sweet potato, beets, and lentils, this is the best Nutro brand for dogs dealing with common food allergies.
pros: No chicken, grain, preservatives, or artificial colors
Great source of vitamins, minerals, and nutrients
cons: Quality food like this can be pricey

customer_reviews.title: Solved all our issues.
customer_reviews.text: We have an 8yo Golden Retriever with a history of seizures. We tried several foods to avoid grain which appears to trigger the seizures. This was the only food that her majesty the world's pickiest dog would eat and not fart poisonous gas. And the seizures have basically stopped. We switched to Amazon because our local pet stores kept switching or moving this. We have to have this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Smells strongly, but my dog enjoys it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to salmon, chicken, corn and grains. This is the only food he can eat and not have a rash! It smells very strongly and it’s not a nice smell but my dog enjoys it. Will mold quickly if moisture is near it or on it from water bowl. Keep this food in an airtight container and only serve what will be eaten at a time. This is not the kind of food to leave out. It will stale quickly and dog won’t touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie f

customer_reviews.title: My 25LB Golden-doodle was biting her paws and itching like crazy since she was a puppy
customer_reviews.text: My 25LB Golden-doodle was biting her paws and itching like crazy since she was a puppy. We tried everything, except the food. We spoke with someone at a local Pet shop and they recommended this brand of Pet Food. Within a few weeks her itching went away completely. I couldn't be happier. Thank you, Nutro!
customer_reviews.author: Jay F.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my silky hair tarrier toy poodle mix ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my silky hair tarrier toy poodle mix who suffers from just about every allergy. Wanted to try a food with absolutely no chicken products. After about a week my picky eater loves the food and his scratching and paw biting has gone down significantly.
customer_reviews.author: William Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best Food!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Nutro! After almost a month of random digestive issues from epic diarrhea to spitting up food nightly, we made the change to this food and all acid, ear itching, and poopy issues were normal within days. Two vet visits and some meds worked temporarily, but alas, an allergy to what seems to be chicken, was the key. Our mini Aussie loves the taste, it seems to process in her body just fine, and no more cleaning up piles of wet, undigested food. For a non-prescription, easy to acquire food- this is the best for pups with allergies to lets call it "regular" dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my dog's skin condition
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand because, when my dog was younger did a lot of chewing himself, I tried this "limited ingredient" food. As it happened, I was using regular Nutro, so I tried their limited ingredient. The chewing didn't go away, but it was reduced to manageable levels. So, if your dog is acting itchy, it's something to try. There's a possibility it'll work. And if not, you can still use the food and try something else!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Allergies?? Try this stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome food! My hound has allergies and the Nutro limited ingredient lamb and sweet potato is a life saver. Not sure of it's grains or chicken my dog is allergic too yet, I always fed him chicken and rice by Diamonds, but he developed an allergy. We switched to Blue Buffalo, but he won't eat the "Vitamin Bits" in their food, (he insists on kibble all uniform in size and shape). Alas, something he can eat!!!! 4 out of 5 stars because it's still too expensive. I'll pay this much- only because of the allergies- my dog suffers from severe itching- otherwise too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Blue Buffalo Red, and my dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this mixed in with their NUTRO wet lamb and rice. It's healthy and I put them on this so they could lose some weight, and after a month, I don't see a different in weight loss. I had them on 1/2 a cup of Blue Buffalo Red once a day, and they are medium/smaller dogs, and now I've cut down to 1/4 cup twice a day mixed with a spoon full of the wet NUTRO LIDAWDG, and they like it. It doesn't seem like it's a lot of food, and I really thought they would loose a couple of LBS, but no. So they are eating healthy, and doing great.
customer_reviews.author: NJD & DMD

customer_reviews.title: Good product WAY to expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a really small bag for the price you pay and it didn't even last as long as most other brands this size. Of course my dog loved it because he loves anything high quality and that's probably why it didn't last. If you are looking for quality this is really good but if you are looking for something to last a month you will have to buy a much bigger version of this
customer_reviews.author: Leanne LuPau

customer_reviews.title: Nutro Lamb & Rice Changed formula and Added Chicken as 2nd Ingredient w. No Warning
customer_reviews.text: Nutro Lamb & Rice Changed formula and Added Chicken as 2nd Ingredient w. No Warning. My dog and several others became quite ill with the change. If your dog cannot eat chicken, stay away from this dogfood- the Mars company owns the brand and did not warn consumers. They are now selling in grocery stores- no longer a good option for dogs needing a bland diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Love that product doesn’t have a lot of additives, or dyes. My dog, an elderly Shih Tzu, has a lot of allergies that causes skin pigmentation darkening around her stomach and bloating. This food has stopped her from overeating also, which she would do from a past history of cheap processed foods. We have tried other brands, that were promoted as good and nutritious for your dog, only to find it irritated her allergies. I just wish it came in 11lb bag, 4 doesn’t last a whole month and afraid 22lb bag would go stale before finished.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Butt (anal sacks/glands)
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets a case of the stank a** , a.k.a. glands and from what I can tell so far it seems to revolve around different treats, bones & dog foods. I havent been able to identify the specific ingredient (s), however a few specific brands and type of treats I have been able to eliminate. The Nutro limited ingredient seemed to do well for him and I will be ordering it again. It is important to note that some foods are ok in the beginning but after a few months then he seems to develop an issue with them, soonly time will tell on this .
customer_reviews.author: CreativeOddball

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has been on this food for about 3 months now, I wanted to switch him to a grain free diet as he has lots of skin allergies. With lamb being the #1 ingredient I definitely like this food for him. He gobbles it up and I also add fish oil to his food to help his skin/coat and he looks so much better.
customer_reviews.author: kpratz

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the right dog food!
customer_reviews.text: This little boy loves his new food. Poor pup has serious food allergies. When we switched he loved the flavor. He’s picky about his food. Mostly his scratching and paw chewing has almost subsided! And it’s only been a few weeks. His coat is shinier and he is having easier poops too. He just turned 5 and we have struggled to find a dog food he enjoys the taste and leaves him ‘scratching free’. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Veilleux

customer_reviews.title: NUTRO LIMITED INGREDIENTS
customer_reviews.text: Due to Canidae increasing price by 30%, I chose to switch to NUTRO Lamb. I am sooooo glad that I did. My ”7” year old Briard always gnawed on his front legs. Thus, leaving fur wet and matted. Now after switching to NUTRO lamb, no more wet and matted legs. Stools are firm and he seems to like the food. Glad that I switched from Grain free Canidae to NUTRO Limited ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: General Sage De Normandie

customer_reviews.title: Get the best quality food you can for your dog.
customer_reviews.text: My young lab didn’t do well with grains or potatoes. My vet suggested a change to his diet. Since my golden did well with the Nutro brand I decided to try them both on the Duck and Lentil. As you can see they are sleek and beautiful and both are thriving on this food. And no more stomach problems with either dog.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: No more allergies yay!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 yo German Shepherd used to have allergies and was itching all the time. We tried out everything: raw diet, homemade food, grain free, different dry food, etc. But allergy came back over and over again. Until my sister told me about Nutro. So I bought it (it was Lamb & Rice) and it worked! No more allergy reaction no more itching. For the last 7 months I've purchased all flavours (except Chicken): Lamb & Rice, Lamb & Sweet potato, Venison & Sweet potato, Duck, even Salmon :-) All of them were good! Her fav now is Duck and Lamb with potato :-)
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: It has healthy ingredients. Changed my dogs furry coat.
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is expensive, but the fact that it carries fish in it really helps my dogs coat. He’s a Husky + Black Lab and sheds his undercoat at least every 3 months. And this dog food has changed his coat. He sheds a lot less now. We change The food around. Sometimes he gets the fish and then the next bag we follow up with has been the same brand but with Lamb. He eats it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Working great for our pup. Flavor review is based on a dog eating a new food. She loves it. Low smell( with seafood based diets, the food gets interesting at best). Regular bowels and no irritation. Higher energy and she is eating the same and loosing weight slowly. Vet recommended. LID diet. Possible beef allergy. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P Weingarten

customer_reviews.title: Good staple diet!!
customer_reviews.text: My shelty and corgi loves this! Love the idea that the ingredients is fish based so excellent for coat care. Also love how its 22% protein and 14% fat so good for puppies too!!!! Most of all, best bang for the buck. My other pets love them as a staple ! A savannah monitor and a greek tortoise! Well balanced diet even better for all pets!
customer_reviews.author: yrb230032

customer_reviews.title: No more skin allergies!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had skin issues since he was a pup, and I was convinced he was allergic to grass. Well that was not the case, it was his food. After switching him to Nutro limited ingredient, we have had no skin issues. He -also loves the taste. Before he sometimes wouldn’t eat, or throw up his old food. Now he can’t wait to eat, and we have had no issues with throwing up either.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Dogs wouldn't eat it
customer_reviews.text: This is a review for the Salmon version. I had my hopes up, since the ingredients looked good and it had very positive reviews. However, my two dogs wouldn't touch it. They like fish, but I guess not this dog food flavor. The other issue is that the kibbles are round and very small.
customer_reviews.author: familyguy

customer_reviews.title: Healthier option for small to medium dogs
customer_reviews.text: I give my greyhound Nutro Limited Ingredient kibble - when I rescued a whippet, I wanted to put her on the same quality food. Small bites was the answer - a perfect size for a smaller breed with same quality as the standard dry food. They both love Nutro limited ingredient kibble - nothing is ever left behind.
customer_reviews.author: QueensKid

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog with a poultry allergy and skin problems. We switched to this food and her skin/coat got way nicer. We also have another dog who is a picky eater, and he'll eat this food. It makes their breath smell super fishy and gross, but whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina N.

customer_reviews.title: My dog ate it
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate this for a few years but the vet wants me to transition to a "senior" food now. Benny had been having issues and we settled on Nutro after multiple failed attempts at finding a food that didn't give him allergies. This food was the one that stopped his constant licking without costing me a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Iroc

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are all high quality. However due to allergies this just did t work for my retriever. I finally found a limited diet by Merrick that worked well but now it’s been discontinued so the hunt begins again. Wanted to like this but just didn’t fit for him.
customer_reviews.author: sguerney

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize when they changed the packaging they changed the formula too! A month or 2 into feeding the new food, I realized my dogs coats were shinier, and looked better overall. They also gained 1 pounds each, which in a cocker is a lot. I asked my local pet store about it, and they told me about the new formula. I cut back a little of the food, substituted string beans, and couldn’t be happier! My favorite dog food just got better!
customer_reviews.author: alan s gadol

customer_reviews.title: Good for lab
customer_reviews.text: Price was a little high but cleared up my labradors ear infection caused by her food
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Kaelber

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT for my dog with many allergies
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent. After many hours of researching. I went with this "a proteins source he was never exposed to." Things are much improved. ( after 4 vets, a pharmacist, and over six changes of food). He also loves the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Old Nurse

customer_reviews.title: No digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a very sensitive stomach - especially if she is having anxiety. Ever since I switched her to this limited ingredient nutro diet, she has had no digestive issues. I can't say much about the flavor. Weird that they have that as an option. This is not for humans lol
customer_reviews.author: Jonny S

customer_reviews.title: Poodle won't eat
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a product with limited ingredients for my standard poodle, the product was on Google search as recommended product for poodles. Well I have had a couple of weeks and she will hardly eat it. I have mixed with her regular balance nutrition food and she picks around the nitro. I don't mind paying for something she will eat but lots of money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: my dogs can eat clean just like me!
customer_reviews.text: NUTRO LID is fantastic. Clean non-gmo ingredients at a reasonable price. Dog has allergies and does well on this. Good for my big and small dogs of various ages. Seems to taste good too.
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: My Spoiled Bitch (literally) Dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My female Golden/Ridgeback mix loves this food. She is the pickiest eater and will go for days without eating if she doesn't like the dog food, and I don't want her to eat crap. No need to worry with this Brand, good ingredients and it shows in the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Watters in Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have four dogs. One dog needs a separate food...the salmon. The other dogs like small bites, so I purchase the small bites in lamb for them. Dogs eat food regularly now that I use Nutro but before, they were not.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: My shiba has turned into a pig
customer_reviews.text: Never have I ever seen my shiba been so obsess with eating a kibble. It's actually driving me insane when he is constantly digging at his ceramic dog bowl to ask for more. What kind of ingredients are in there? Nicotine? Cocaine? In all honesty, I think he absolutely loves lamb.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Love Nutro LID foods
customer_reviews.text: Hoping that the price will drop a bit when ordering online. These low ingredient dog foods are great but expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog food we feed our Standard Poodles. They love it. They always receive excellent health check ups from the vet. Will buy again.... and again.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Wright

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive but dog approves
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but our dog loves it And has put on weight. Every morning he hurry’s up does his business outside and runs inside to get his food.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Dreisbach

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky but I’ve found he loves salmon in many forms & it’s good for him. I ordered the 14 lb due to price & to see if he liked it, he did. I’ll order more for monthly as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Consumer A

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my puppies!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 dogs eat this. One has a sensitive stomach and the other two have skin conditions the don’t bother them on this food. They don’t itch as much so they (and I) are much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Healty..
customer_reviews.text: My westie has many allergies especially to many food products and this dog food has been a savior, and she gobbles it up so must be tasty as well..Thx
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Z

customer_reviews.title: Nutro made my dogs deathly ill
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy nutro food. I used to feed my dogs nutro for years. Recently the product quality has gone down and the ingredients caused my dogs to become very ill. It’s been happening to many people just google it. Find something better for your dogs than this food.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for chicken allergies
customer_reviews.text: Great for dogs who can't have anything with chicken or chicken by-product in it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Improved digestion
customer_reviews.text: This improved my dog's loose stool. Dog's love taste. So happy this arrived quickly. Dogs were pawing at bag to get fed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Miller

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Product seems a little expensive but nutrition discontinued food I was using. Had no choice
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Holste

customer_reviews.title: Good for skin issues
customer_reviews.text: Brittany spaniel w/ lots of skin issues noticed she is significantly less itchy since switching to this food, and seems to like the taste better too! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Beka Homan

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Great food, my dogs always love it, changed to nutro about a year ago and dogs iching problems solved.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sweetie likes it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one dry dog food that our little miniature poodle will eat! Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Kijana

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Started buying this a few years back for my lab who had food allergies. The limited ingredient blend keeps his hair loss and flakey skin to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food. Has solved my dog's food allergy issues. Both of my dogs eat it and love it.
customer_reviews.author: mineto4

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loving Food
customer_reviews.text: Our small dog loves it. Just right size so it stays fresh.
customer_reviews.author: ChisJust

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to chicken so this is a great alternative with good ingredients made in the USA, what more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved it, her Breath STUNK though!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this. But I wasn’t prepared for the horrible fish-breath!! I’m going to mix it in with her Nutro lamb & sweet potato until it’s gone, because... Man, her breath was awful!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Our dog likes this food and it has good ingredients while being grain free I wish the price would come down a bit though
customer_reviews.author: Oden AK

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this because of possible allergies. hoping it will make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with allergies
customer_reviews.text: my dog who has allergies does great on this food and she loves the taste of it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Warner

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES this flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to chicken tried others she didn’t like much but she LOVES this would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Best for sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a VERY sensitive stomach and so far this has been the best option for him.

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I like limited ingredients, dogs are not crazy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Triple GGG

customer_reviews.title: Pakacging and shipping dry dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are enjoying and gastrointestinal issues have subsided. However, my first bag arrived wet. Packaging and shipping in all climates needs to be taken into consideration. Cannot afford to toss this dog food as it is not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Rose

customer_reviews.title: Look local first before you buy
customer_reviews.text: My doggo loves this food. But I just found it at a local pet store for 5$ cheaper!!

customer_reviews.title: Good eats
customer_reviews.text: High quality dog food! Glad there's a dog food with limited ingredients for sensitive dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food! They literally run to the dog bowl when I say it’s time to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Alysa P

customer_reviews.title: My dog give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This food helped my dog gain weight when nothing else wood. I even tried blue buffalo and a raw diet. She love this food.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old lab has terrible allergies and this food has been a life saver. Her coat looks great too.

customer_reviews.text: WE USED THIS PRODUCT AND WHEN WE GOT TO THE MIDDLE OF THE BAG THERE WAS A MOUSE

customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love this product, they both ate every bite of product, plus I put this product In the puzzle toy, Gives them a good meal while keeping them busy playing with their puzzle toy
customer_reviews.author: G V

customer_reviews.title: Quality food
customer_reviews.text: Good food for my lab. Had to switch after she suddenly stopped eating wellness simple out of the blue and this one was recommended since it had similar ingredients. She seems to like this one better. Keeps her coat shiny.

customer_reviews.title: good dog food
customer_reviews.text: my dogs stomach is very sensitive and this is easier for him to digest

customer_reviews.title: My German Shepherd LOVES!
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd loves this food! And it actually smells pretty nice, it’s not overbearing.

customer_reviews.title: I love that it's healthy and is grain-free
customer_reviews.text: Although sort of pricey, our dog loves this food. I love that it's healthy and is grain-free.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it and her vet says it's a healthy choice.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. Her vet says it's a healthy choice. What more needs to be said.

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs who are on limited diets
customer_reviews.text: Great food for a dog that’s ok a limited diet. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: N. Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food but not a great value
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and he has food allergies. Sadly this 22 pound bag only lasted him 5 weeks so I switched to the Nutro essentials which he seems to like equally well and this is $10 less for 30 pounds which lasts him 9 weeks. Mathematically this does not compute but the size of the kibble is completely different and the 30 pounds bag completely fills up our doggie food container where the supposed 22 pound bag fills it just over half.
customer_reviews.author: lucky louie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and they're healthy little dogs and their coats are beautiful!

customer_reviews.text: My dog has very sensitive skin and this formula has seemed to work out much better for her. It is more expensive than normal dog food but worth it!

customer_reviews.text: I got tired of getting damaged products from other online pet stores.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multiple food allergies
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has severe food allergies and this limited ingredient formula is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kline

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs love this stuff! It has improved one of my dogs skin allergies and is good for the sensitive stomach of one of my other dogs. Makes my fur babies coats feel silky smooth too!

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food... for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Good midline priced dog food - especially with dogs who are allergic to grains and chicken.

customer_reviews.text: Good food, but price keep going up . time to look for another brand

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dog ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog ever! We get so many compliments on our dog coat and I believe it's because of his dog food.

customer_reviews.text: Was at an excellent price then price increased by 26.00 :+(

customer_reviews.title: Seal opened up
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good quality. The packaging has been good. However, I received a pack with an open zip lock seal on one side. The zip lock itself stayed together but came off one side (See pictures). I get a monthly Amazon subscription for the product.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. My dog loves it and it’s healthy ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. My dog loves it and it’s healthy for him. Price on amazon is on par with prices in store.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr ordered!
customer_reviews.text: My new veterinarian allergy specialist loves Nutro products. My dog loves this salmon limited ingredient dry dog food. Win-Win!

customer_reviews.title: Good food, but price jumped $8.31 per bag
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Smells great, my dogs love it, and their coats are shiny. The subscribe and save is awesome. However the price jumped from 33.23 to 41.54 ($8.31 more per bag) between my last 2 orders. Not sure what gives, but definitely doesn’t seem right.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great food, happy healthy fur babies!
customer_reviews.text: The only food that doesn't give my 2yr German Sheppard soft stool!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and I like them to have a nutritious meal without all the fillers of other dog foods.

customer_reviews.title: Wish this went on sale more
customer_reviews.text: This is the only type of food that doesnt give my dog diarrhea. The venison and salmon version work great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Food!! But somewhat stale from Amazon. Try it locally.
customer_reviews.author: T. McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our older dog. He has always had skin issues and stomach. Salmon is milder, easier to digest. Hard for me to locate at our local Petsmart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a chicken allergy so this food has helped him a lot.
customer_reviews.author: mi'chale brewer

customer_reviews.title: My dog's health
customer_reviews.text: Got my dogs off of chicken and grains. They love this combination
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Brandner

customer_reviews.title: Frenchies Love It
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 French Bulldogs, one with allergies. This dog food satisfies all their needs without adding to the itchies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food for dogs with sensitive stomachs.
customer_reviews.text: Great food for dogs with sensitive stomach and/or coat. Skin rashes were gone after 1week of Nutro limited ingredients diet. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ru

customer_reviews.title: Rufus loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Rufus the Entlebucher Sennenhunde loves it! This food seems to be nutrient-rich, and appreciate the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo05

product_meta.title: NUTRO Limited Ingredient Diet Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Venison| Size:22 Lb.NUTRO Limited Ingredient Diet Natural Adult Dry Dog Food Venison Meal & Sweet Potato is made using 10 key ingredients or less plus natural flavors, vitamins minerals and other nutrients. These dry dog food recipes avoid ingredients that commonly cause food sensitivities in pets, like chicken, beef, corn, wheat, soy and dairy protein. Prepared with high-quality Venison meal and real sweet potatoes, this grain-free dog food not only tastes great, but it also nourishes sensitive skin for a soft and shiny coat –– guaranteed or your money back. NUTRO Limited Ingredient Diet Food for Dogs also follows the NUTRO FEED CLEAN philosophy, is always made with Non-GMO* Ingredients and is made with no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. * Trace amounts of genetically modified material might be present due to potential cross contact during manufacturing.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 22 lb. bag of NUTRO Limited Ingredient Diet Natural Adult Dry Dog Food Venison Meal & Sweet Potato; Natural Dog Food Plus Vitamins, Minerals and Other Nutrients
Always Made With 10 Key Ingredients Or Less, Plus Natural Flavors, Vitamins, Minerals And Other Nutrients
Nutro Limited Ingredient Diet Recipes Are Grain Free, And Avoid Ingredients That Commonly Cause Food Sensitivities In Pets Like Corn, Wheat, Soy And Dairy Protein
This Nutro Dry Dog Food Is Made With Non-Gmo Ingredients*
